mapper.select: select a.BEST_MBER_NO, a.MBER_SN, a.BEST_MBER_DATE, a.BEST_MBER_PJTCNT, b.mber_nm from best_member a, member b where a.mber_sn = b.mber_sn order by a.best_mber_no desc
select a.best_knh_no, a.knh_no, a.best_knh_likecnt, a.best_knh_date, b.knh_title from best_knowhow a,knowhow b where a.knh_no = b.knh_no order by a.best_knh_no desc
select a.best_pjt_no , a.prjct_sn , a.best_pjt_date, a.best_pjt_cnt, b.prjct_sj from best_project a , project b where a.prjct_sn = b.prjct_sn order by a.best_pjt_date desc
